verses.verse: Thou shalt not <WH3808> raise <WH5375> a false <WH7723> report: <WH8088> put <WH7896> not <WH408> thine hand <WH3027> with <WH5973> the wicked <WH7563> to be <WH1961> an unrighteous <WH2555> witness. <WH5707>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> follow <WH1961> <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> to do evil; <WH7451> neither <WH3808> shalt thou speak <WH6030> in <WH5921> a cause <WH7379> to decline <WH5186> after <WH310> many <WH7227> to wrest <WH5186> judgment:
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou countenance <WH1921> a poor man <WH1800> in his cause. <WH7379>
If <WH3588> thou meet <WH6293> thine enemy's <WH341> ox <WH7794> or <WH176> his ass <WH2543> going astray, <WH8582> thou shalt surely bring it back to him again. <WH7725> <WH7725>

If <WH3588> thou see <WH7200> the ass <WH2543> of him that hateth <WH8130> thee lying <WH7257> under <WH8478> his burden, <WH4853> and wouldest forbear <WH2308> to help <WH4480> <WH5800> him, thou shalt surely help <WH5800> <WH5800> with <WH5973> him.
Thou shalt not <WH3808> wrest <WH5186> the judgment <WH4941> of thy poor <WH34> in his cause. <WH7379>

Keep thee far <WH7368> from a false matter; <WH4480> <WH1697> <WH8267> and the innocent <WH5355> and righteous <WH6662> slay <WH2026> thou not: <WH408> for <WH3588> I will not <WH3808> justify <WH6663> the wicked. <WH7563>
And thou shalt take <WH3947> no <WH3808> gift: <WH7810> for <WH3588> the gift <WH7810> blindeth <WH5786> the wise, <WH6493> and perverteth <WH5557> the words <WH1697> of the righteous. <WH6662>

Also thou shalt not <WH3808> oppress <WH3905> a stranger: <WH1616> for ye <WH859> know <WH3045> <WH853> the heart <WH5315> of a stranger, <WH1616> seeing <WH3588> ye were <WH1961> strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
And six <WH8337> years <WH8141> thou shalt sow <WH2232> <WH853> thy land, <WH776> and shalt gather in <WH622> <WH853> the fruits <WH8393> thereof:

But the seventh <WH7637> year thou shalt let it rest <WH8058> and lie still; <WH5203> that the poor <WH34> of thy people <WH5971> may eat: <WH398> and what they leave <WH3499> the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall eat. <WH398> In like manner <WH3651> thou shalt deal <WH6213> with thy vineyard, <WH3754> and with thy oliveyard. <WH2132>

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt do <WH6213> thy work, <WH4639> and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> thou shalt rest: <WH7673> that <WH4616> thine ox <WH7794> and thine ass <WH2543> may rest, <WH5117> and the son <WH1121> of thy handmaid, <WH519> and the stranger, <WH1616> may be refreshed. <WH5314>

And in all <WH3605> things that <WH834> I have said <WH559> unto <WH413> you be circumspect: <WH8104> and make no mention <WH2142> <WH3808> of the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> gods, <WH430> neither <WH3808> let it be heard <WH8085> out of <WH5921> thy mouth. <WH6310>
Three <WH7969> times <WH7272> thou shalt keep a feast <WH2287> unto me in the year. <WH8141>

Thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH853> the feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread: <WH4682> (thou shalt eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682> seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> as <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> thee, in the time appointed <WH4150> of the month <WH2320> Abib; <WH24> for <WH3588> in it thou camest out <WH3318> from Egypt: <WH4480> <WH4714> and none <WH3808> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> me empty: ) <WH7387>

And the feast <WH2282> of harvest, <WH7105> the firstfruits <WH1061> of thy labors, <WH4639> which <WH834> thou hast sown <WH2232> in the field: <WH7704> and the feast <WH2282> of ingathering, <WH614> which is in the end <WH3318> of the year, <WH8141> when thou hast gathered in <WH622> <WH853> thy labors <WH4639> out of <WH4480> the field. <WH7704>
Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in the year <WH8141> all <WH3605> thy males <WH2138> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH413> <WH6440> the Lord <WH113> GOD. <WH3068>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> offer <WH2076> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with <WH5921> leavened bread; <WH2557> neither <WH3808> shall the fat <WH2459> of my sacrifice <WH2282> remain <WH3885> until <WH5704> the morning. <WH1242>

The first <WH7225> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of thy land <WH127> thou shalt bring <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God. <WH430> Thou shalt not <WH3808> seethe <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in his mother's <WH517> milk. <WH2461>

Behold, <WH2009> I <WH595> send <WH7971> an Angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> thee, to keep <WH8104> thee in the way, <WH1870> and to bring <WH935> thee into <WH413> the place <WH4725> which <WH834> I have prepared. <WH3559>

Beware <WH8104> of <WH4480> <WH6440> him, and obey <WH8085> his voice, <WH6963> provoke <WH4843> him not; <WH408> for <WH3588> he will not <WH3808> pardon <WH5375> your transgressions: <WH6588> for <WH3588> my name <WH8034> is in <WH7130> him.

But <WH3588> if <WH518> thou shalt indeed obey <WH8085> <WH8085> his voice, <WH6963> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> that <WH834> I speak; <WH1696> then I will be an enemy <WH340> <WH853> unto thine enemies, <WH341> and an adversary <WH6696> <WH853> unto thine adversaries. <WH6887>

For <WH3588> mine Angel <WH4397> shall go <WH1980> before <WH6440> thee, and bring thee in <WH935> unto <WH413> the Amorites, <WH567> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Canaanites, <WH3669> the Hivites, <WH2340> and the Jebusites: <WH2983> and I will cut them off. <WH3582>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> bow down <WH7812> to their gods, <WH430> nor <WH3808> serve <WH5647> them, nor <WH3808> do <WH6213> after their works: <WH4639> but <WH3588> thou shalt utterly overthrow <WH2040> <WH2040> them, and quite break down <WH7665> <WH7665> their images. <WH4676>

And ye shall serve <WH5647> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and he shall bless <WH1288> <WH853> thy bread, <WH3899> and thy water; <WH4325> and I will take sickness away <WH5493> <WH4245> from the midst <WH4480> <WH7130> of thee.
There shall nothing <WH3808> cast their young, <WH1961> <WH7921> nor be barren, <WH6135> in thy land: <WH776> <WH853> the number <WH4557> of thy days <WH3117> I will fulfill. <WH4390>

I will send <WH7971> <WH853> my fear <WH367> before <WH6440> thee, and will destroy <WH2000> <WH853> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> to whom <WH834> thou shalt come, <WH935> and I will make <WH5414> <WH853> all <WH3605> thine enemies <WH341> turn their backs <WH6203> unto <WH413> thee.

And I will send <WH7971> <WH853> hornets <WH6880> before <WH6440> thee, which shall drive out <WH1644> <WH853> the Hivite, <WH2340> <WH853> the Canaanite, <WH3669> and the Hittite, <WH2850> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee.

I will not <WH3808> drive them out <WH1644> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee in one <WH259> year; <WH8141> lest <WH6435> the land <WH776> become <WH1961> desolate, <WH8077> and the beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> multiply <WH7227> against <WH5921> thee.

By little <WH4592> and little <WH4592> I will drive them out <WH1644> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee, until <WH5704> <WH834> thou be increased, <WH6509> and inherit <WH5157> <WH853> the land. <WH776>

And I will set <WH7896> <WH853> thy bounds <WH1366> from the Red sea <WH4480> <WH3220> <WH5488> even unto <WH5704> the sea <WH3220> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and from the desert <WH4480> <WH4057> unto <WH5704> the river: <WH5104> for <WH3588> I will deliver <WH5414> <WH853> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> into your hand; <WH3027> and thou shalt drive them out <WH1644> before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee.
Thou shalt make <WH3772> no <WH3808> covenant <WH1285> with them, nor with their gods. <WH430>

They shall not <WH3808> dwell <WH3427> in thy land, <WH776> lest <WH6435> they make thee sin <WH2398> <WH853> against me: for <WH3588> if thou serve <WH5647> <WH853> their gods, <WH430> it will surely <WH3588> be <WH1961> a snare <WH4170> unto thee.
